name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TestChimp - Create API Automation Tests Easily From Manual Test Sessions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture UI + API activity during testing sessions. Easily convert them to automation tests with no code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TestChimp is a powerful no code platform for building user journey API tests from manual test sessions.

1) Build Multi-Step API tests in one-click from manual test sessions

This chrome extension captures UI + API activity during manual tests, which are automatically exported to your TestChimp account. You can then easily build automation tests from those recordings, and collaborate with other testers / devs in your team. 

TestChimp analyzes recorded payloads to intelligently suggest thorough assertions and chains the requests by defining appropriate variables - making test authoring a breeze. You can edit the test via our intuitive no-code Test Studio with just a few clicks.

2) Share bug reports / sessions easily with TestChimp Permalinks

Tired of uploading bulky video files to Jira tickets / reports etc. Going back and forth with devs to communicate more context and troubleshoot? Each session captured by TestChimp gets a unique permalink - ideal for linking in bug reports, and sharing with devs for troubleshooting - without needing for bulky uploads.

3) Simplified Exploratory Testing with TestChimp Context Menu Add-ons

Want to input test credit card numbers? Invalid urls? A large text? TestChimp extension adds convenient access to common edge cases, valid / invalid inputs for quicker exploratory testing. It also adds dynamic value support such as current date,  random values etc. You can select any text and add them as a custom vocabulary item, giving easy access to commonly used domain specific inputs for your systems.
